title: Wagner in Sudan: What have Russian mercenaries been up to?
description: The Wagner group denies involvement in the current conflict, but there's evidence it has previously been active in Sudan.

title: Millions of families miss out on cheap broadband
description: Ofcom is concerned that people are not getting the broadband social tariffs they are entitled to.

title: West Bank: Brother of Palestinian killed in Hawara seeks answers
description: The family of a man killed amid a rampage by Israeli settlers fear no-one will be held to account.

title: Aitch: Rapper does skydive in honour of sister Gracie
description: The rapper made the jump in honour of his little sister Gracie, 13, who has Down's Syndrome.

title: School tutoring: One third of £594m post-lockdown cash unspent
description: Education experts say the national tutoring programme helped some pupils but could have reached more.

title: Maleficent: Dragon catches fire during Disneyland show in LA
description: Maleficent the fire-breathing dragon dramatically went up in flames during Saturday's live show.

title: The Papers: Labour racism row and Britons rescued from Sudan
description: Diane Abbott loses the Labour whip and Britons being evacuated from war-torn Sudan lead Monday's papers.

title: Newcastle 6-1 Tottenham: It's too late to save Spurs' season - Jermaine Jenas analysis
description: Former Tottenham midfielder Jermaine Jenas explains why his old side's problems on the pitch reflect their lack of direction off it.

title: World Snooker Championship 2023: Four-time world champion John Higgins hammers Kyren Wilson
description: John Higgins storms to an impressive 13-2 victory over Kyren Wilson to book his place in a 17th World Championship quarter-final.

title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Jota, Rice, Guehi, Mahrez
description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?

title: Barry: 'A stranger I met at the beach gave me her kidney'
description: Lucy Humphrey's dog, Indie, "chose" the woman who was able to give her the transplant she needed.

title: Derby: Man charged over fatal dog attack at house
description: Wayne Stevens, 51, died after being injured by a dog that was shot dead by police.

title: Wrexham: Ryan Reynolds fulfils fan Jay Fear's dying wish
description: Jay Fear, who has terminal cancer, has an "incredible 24 hours" meeting the star Wrexham co-owner.

title: Brighton 0-0 Man Utd (6-7 on pens): Victor Lindelof scores winning penalty to set up first all-Manchester FA Cup final
description: Manchester United beat Brighton 7-6 on penalties at Wembley to set up the first all-Manchester FA Cup final.

title: FA Cup highlights: Man Utd beat Brighton on penalties to reach final
description: Watch highlights as Manchester United beating Brighton in a tense penalty shootout at Wembley Stadium to set up a first FA Cup final against Manchester City.

title: Aberdeen 2-0 Rangers: Liam Scales leads the way for rejuvenated Aberdeen
description: Liam Scales' transformation is emblematic of how Aberdeen have become a different team under Barry Robson, whose stock continues to rise.

title: London Marathon: Sifan Hassan overcomes injury to claim rollercoaster victory in debut marathon
description: Sifan Hassan overcomes injury and a world-class field to win the London Marathon - possibly the greatest victory over the distance ever.

title: Women's Champions League: Arsenal's mission accomplished in Germany but only half-time in tie
description: Arsenal accomplish their Women's Champions League mission in Wolfsburg - and they did so despite a tough week of injury setbacks - but it remains half-time in a finely balanced tie.

title: Newcastle 6-1 Tottenham: Champions League showdown that was a humiliation
description: It was the 21 minutes that cemented Newcastle's place as favourites for a Champions League return - and illustrated the shambolic state Tottenham are in.

title: World Snooker Championship 2023: Anthony McGill leads Jack Lisowski 11-5 as alarm stops play
description: Qualifier Anthony McGill needs two frames for a World Championship quarter-final place after leading Jack Lisowski 11-5.

title: Women's Six Nations 2023: France beat Wales 39-14 to set up title decider against England
description: France withstand a spirited second-half from Wales to set up a Grand Slam decider against England.

title: Watch moment sirens start on phones across the UK
description: Alerts began sounding just before 15:00 BST, though some people didn't receive one at all.

title: Emergency alert test fails to sound on some phones
description: An emergency test alarm system went off on millions of people's smartphones at 15:00 on Sunday.

title: Newcastle United 6-1 Tottenham Hotspur: Toon score six to overpower Spurs
description: Newcastle United demolish shell-shocked Tottenham Hotspur with five goals in 21 stunning first-half minutes at St James' Park.

title: Proclaimers removed from King's coronation playlist
description: The BBC understands the move was made in response to complaints about the band's anti-royal views.

title: British diplomats evacuated from Sudan
description: British diplomats and their families evacuated from Sudan in a "complex and rapid" operation, PM says.

title: London Marathon 2023: Kelvin Kiptum wins the men's race in course record
description: Watch as Kenya's Kelvin Kiptum smashes compatriot Eliud Kipchoge's course record to win the men's London Marathon on his debut at the race.

title: London Marathon 2023: Kelvin Kiptum and Sifan Hassan win with superb runs
description: Kelvin Kiptum wins the men's London Marathon in the second-fast time ever, while Sifan Hassan produces a remarkable run to win the women's race.

title: Diane Abbott suspended as Labour MP after racism letter
description: Diane Abbott is suspended as a Labour MP pending an investigation into a letter she wrote about racism.

title: London Marathon 2023: Sifan Hassan overcomes injury to win on marathon debut
description: Watch as double Olympic track champion Sifan Hassan overcomes injury in the London Marathon's early stages to win on her debut at the distance.

title: CBI rape allegations 'shocking' says Labour shadow minister
description: The lobbying group needs 'root and branch' reform, says Labour's Jonathan Ashworth.

title: Thabo Bester: Body used in South African rapist's prison break identified
description: Notorious South African rapist Thabo Bester faked his own death to break out of prison last year.

title: Twitter restores blue tick to high profile accounts
description: Twitter restores the verified blue badge to accounts that insist they did not pay for a subscription.

title: Ofsted boss defends inspection after teacher death
description: Amanda Spielman says she has no reason to doubt school inspection, after its headteacher took her life.

title: Joe Cordina v Shavkatdzhon Rakhimov: Welshman reclaims title with split-decision victory
description: Watch highlights as Joe Cordina reclaims his IBF super-featherweight title with a split-decision victory over Shavkatdzhon Rakhimov in Cardiff.

title: Jack Teixeira: The video game players sharing secrets online
description: Online gamers are posting classified documents online to settle arguments over military hardware.

title: Unbeaten Gervonta Davis hands Ryan Garcia first defeat with seventh-round knockout
description: Gervonta Davis extends his unbeaten record to 29-0 as he hands Ryan Garcia the first defeat of his career with a seventh-round knockout.

title: Looking after tiny islands 'best job in the world'
description: Jonathan Grant is working his last season as caretaker for three uninhabited Scottish islands.

title: Ryan Reynolds gatecrashes post-match presser for player's shirt
description: The club's co-owner demands a memento from goalkeeper Ben Foster after their promotion to the Football League.

title: Amritpal Singh: Sikh separatist arrested after weeks on the run
description: Indian police have arrested self-styled Sikh preacher Amritpal Singh, who was accused of attempted murder.

title: Sudan fighting: US military evacuates diplomats from Khartoum
description: The American military evacuated embassy staff and their families overnight, President Biden says.

title: London Marathon 2023: Mo Farah, four-time Olympic champion, ready for 'special' race
description: Mo Farah pays tribute to the "special" London Marathon before his final race and reminisces about the first time he met BBC commentator Steve Cram.

title: The Papers: 'Activists target Suella' and 'Goodnight Possums'
description: The home secretary's plan to target illegal migration and tributes for entertainer Barry Humphries lead Sunday's papers.

title: London Marathon: The weird and wacky costumes from past to present
description: A look back at some of the best London Marathon costumes donned by runners since 1981.

title: Tory peer Lord Maude calls for more robust culture in Whitehall
description: Lord Maude's call follows Dominic Raab resigning as deputy prime minister over bullying claims.
